Text.val: //02-03-2003 JP SCR #3076 declare unique session-id for every online instance

//Implement FL Application Server on IBM i
This Variable is used in the application server mode!!!
10.09.2014 SH SCR19016 Removed "Graph" event
25.08.2014 AS SCR#19089, added function FL_GetVar_NameValue

19.01.2012 AS SCR17067 program does now open a form for which a wallpaper has been set.
The bitmap which is used for the wallpaper is read from .INI section FLSETTINGS
01.12.2011 SH SCR16785 Removed event Shift+F10 to call UFB100 (old Magic 9.4 monitor)
24.05.2011 SH SCR16478 Removed call of GB030
20.12.2010 AS SCR#16069 initialize gv.APPSERVER from .ini
12.11.2010 LB //Implement Application Server on IBM i
Don't Call GB700 in Application Server Mode
Don't Call UFB012 when runs on IBMi

variable gv.RAPID_DATA_ENTRY
20.05.2010 SH Removed GV.FLDTA_LIB, was added by Leon but never implemented
29.04.2010 SH Set force write indicator to False for all IniPut() functions
08.04.2010 SH SCR15429 Fixed problem where logical names FLTEMP/FLTEMPI
are set in runtime
23.10.2009 AS SCR#14769 set logical names FLTEMP/FLTEMPI

30.07.2009 AS SCR#14769 get factorlink instace index (to get rid of startup util
29.07.2009 AS SCR#14769 removed ENV_ logical names
02.06.2009 SH Added storing of global variables to global parameters to prevent
processing of startup routines everytime the runtime is activated from studio in
15.05.2009 SH SCR14641 Adjusted PC startup routines for the UniPaaS migration
14.04.2009 SH SCR14463 Removed Alt+F10 to call old debugger version6
26.11.2008 AS SCR#14156 disabled OMQ910 timer event for iBOLT usage
29.02.2008 SH CTL Maintenence: Removed VC stuff (BDC110, BDC112, BDC117)
24-APR-2007 AS renamed v.JobNumber -> gv.JobNumber
17-NOV-2005 AS special handling if application is started as component or from
host application
11-NOV-2005 AS added call to GB738 in TP to read in command line params
//03-05-2005 JP SCR #8213 change condition (=16) to login an internet Applserver
03.02.2005 SH SCR7518 Set Wait = No for Raise event = Excel
8.12.2004 LB Don't call GB700 while activated as Application Server
10.11.2004 JJ SCR7292 workaround excel event via UA7
03.11.2004 JJ SCR7292 Added user event "excel"
25.10.2004 JJ SCR5693 added handling for screen print in landscape
//19-07-2004 JP SCR #6661 change System name for emergency call
//07-07-2004 JP SCR#6378 add new Handler for emergency call
//06-07-2004 JP SCR #6378 enable call to BXA026 again
//16-06-2004 JP SCR #6378 disable call to BXA026. Will be started from AS400 now
12.05.2004 JJ SCR6089 added call client prog event
//20-04-2004 JP SCR #6044 modify Handler for calling BDC117
//12.01.2004 SH SCR5029 Removed call to GB030 after Start program AS400
// 22.12.2003 SH SCR5029 Added new global variable "gv.OPPOSITEEXCHRATE "
and fill wtih call by GB030
//17-07-2003 JP added 2 new handler to call BDC110 and BXA026 from FactorlinkVC
//16-06-2003 JP extend calling BDC112 with time expression to avoid calls
during night (VC system is not responding)
07-06-2003 AS Until the main/startup program confusion is not clear I set
gv.factorlinklib ALWAYS
handling if component or started from host application ...
get instance index ... (used to identify instance in tiltle bar) only
required for NON-AS400 foreground sessions ...
disallow HELLER and empty user to use application in development mode ...
... if runtime is started from studio not the first time, there's no need to
perform the startup processes again, neccessary global variables (defined in
R.M.) could be initialized via gobal parameters
04.05.2006 AS If runtime, gv.User (AS400) is set by PC Start program
In development mode, we set it to USER(0); we do not always want an AS400
//03-05-2005 AS SCR #12491 ensure initialization of gv.OPPOSITEEXCHANGERATE
//09-05-2003 JP SCR #3456 change startup procedure for webapplication
09-OCT-2002 we set gv.startup to 1 if we want to have the startup stuff
executed. In case of an application server in background mode this should only
happen if RUNMODE() eq. -1 !
Application Server ? (Either requester acivated or background mode)
start program if CTL runs on i5 as server ....
//Implement Application Server on IBM i: Call GB700
Only when Job starts in Submit Job Mode
read in command line parameters in memory table ...
30.07.2009 AS (no longer needed since GB027 reads command line)
activate menues when in development ....
//Implement Application Server on IBM i: Don't Call
UFB012 when runs on IBMi
... save global variables (defined in R.M.) to global parameters, to prevent
processing of startup routines everytime the runtime mode is actiavted from
the studio
10.11.2004 JJ WORKAROUND SCR7292
menu items with user events can't be disabled in v9.3
therefore we raise UA7 from menu, which in turn raises excel event
v9.4 SP4 allows disabling of menus linked to user events
This handler is started from the menue "CredMan" only.
It just starts CredMan in a second Magic instance
First it controls, if CredMan windows are open already.
If not, it just starts the first CredMan screen: OID700.
If yes, it starts another Magic session with an additional parameter
This parameter "debtor=" will be noticed in the start program
and will automatically start OID700 in the new session.
If the start program notices a special debtor number in this argument,
it will start OID705 with the specified debtor instead.
GB027 StartProgram PC found a debtor number for Credman on the
command line. Credman will be invoked with this debtor number
Returns content of variable prefixed by its name (Name=Value)
Call with a var index like in: FL_GetVar_NameValue ('', 'XY'VAR)

ExpSyntax.val: 'Need to login to start application in development mode, please enter valid magic logon'
